---
title: "Dublin Midlands WaW Viewer"
format: 
  dashboard:
    theme: zephyr
    logo: images/clock-history.svg
---

```{r}
library(plotly)
source("getData.R")
```


# Page 1

## Column 1
```{r}

plot_ly(james_WaW, x = ~report_date, y = ~WaW, type = 'scatter', mode = 'lines+markers') %>% 
    layout(
    title = "St. James's Hospital WaW over Time",
    xaxis = list(title = "Week Ending"),
    yaxis = list(title = "Weighted Average Wait Time")
  )


```


# Page 2

## Column 1
```{r}

plot_ly(tallaght_WaW, x = ~report_date, y = ~WaW, type = 'scatter', mode = 'lines+markers') %>% 
    layout(
    title = "Tallaght University Hospital WaW over Time",
    xaxis = list(title = "Week Ending"),
    yaxis = list(title = "Weighted Average Wait Time")
  )

```



# Page 3

## Column 1

```{r}

plot_ly(Hospital_WaW, x = ~report_date, y = ~WaW, color = ~`hospital name`, type = 'scatter', mode = 'lines+markers') %>% 
    layout(
    title = "Dublin Midlands Region WaW over Time",
    xaxis = list(title = "Week Ending"),
    yaxis = list(title = "Weighted Average Wait Time")
  )

```
